text: Gremlis Arvelo (born August 21, 1996) is a Venezuelan table tennis player. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the women's singles event, in which she was eliminated in the first round by Lily Zhang. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan female table tennis players Category:Olympic table tennis players of Venezuela Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Venezuela Category:South American Games medalists in table tennis Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games Category:Table tennis players at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Gremlis Arvelo
